mapper.select: SELECT epu.*,e.exam_name FROM exam_page_user epu LEFT JOIN exam e ON epu.exam_id = e.id WHERE 1=1 and epu.user_id = #{userId} and e.is_del = 0

SELECT e.id examId,e.exam_name,e.state,e.start_time,e.end_time,e.create_time, SUM(IF(epu.need_correct = 1 and epu.on_correct = 1,1,0)) correctNum, SUM(IF(epu.need_correct = 1,1,0)) shouldCorrectNum FROM exam_class ec LEFT JOIN exam e ON e.id = ec.exam_id LEFT JOIN exam_page_user epu ON epu.exam_id = e.id and epu.class_id = #{query.classId} WHERE ec.class_id = #{query.classId} and e.is_del = 0 GROUP BY e.id
SELECT epu.*,u.real_name FROM `exam_page_user` epu LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.id = epu.user_id WHERE epu.exam_id = #{query.examId} and epu.class_id = #{query.classId}
